sentence: I got arrested while jamming on my guitar.. apparently, i was fingering a minor.
explanation: Minor can refer to someone under the age of full legal responsibility or a less significant issue.
first_new_sentence: The minor in the store requested a toy from his parents.
second_new_sentence: She took a minor role in the school play, but it was still very enjoyable.

sentence: Why do cows wear bells? their horns dont work.
explanation: Horns can refer to the hard bony outgrowths on the heads of some animals or to the sound produced by a musical instrument or vehicle.
first_new_sentence: The horns on the bull were sharp and pointed.
second_new_sentence: He played the horns in the school band and enjoyed the music.

sentence: These jokes each utilize words that are spelled the same and have different meanings in context. The serious sentences provide clarity on each meaning.
